actions.text: Executive Comment Requested from Army, OMB.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army to deepen the Fox River Channel, Green Bay, Wisconsin to twenty-seven feet.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to deepen the Fox River Channel, Green Bay, Wisconsin, to a depth of 27 feet. Authorizes appropriations for FY 1984 and thereafter.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army to deepen the Fox River Channel, Green Bay, Wisconsin to twenty-seven feet.
